content: the top section there are also 2 options for you to finish your hat if you want to eliminate a little of the bulk from the top follow the option decrease row instructions round 1 hhdc in same st hhdc around putting 3 stitches in the side of each section of 2 half_double_crochet mark last stitch ©2018 twisted arrow designs �3 round 2 hhdc around to stitch marker hhdc in marked stitch and move marker to that stitch round 3- 20 18 16 14 repeat round 2 in a continuous spiral until your hat reaches the measurement needed finish last row by single_crochet slip_stitch in the next 2 sts knot off and cut yarn leaving a long tail for sewing *your hat should measure 10 9 8 7 tall from top to bottom add or subtract any row to get measurement as needed to close hat flip inside out using your tapestry needle weave your yarn in and out through every other stitch and pull tight sew together tightly knot off and cut yarn optional decrease row decrease around slip_stitch to join knot off and cut yarn decrease= insert hook in stitch and pull up a loop insert hook in next st and pull up a loop yo and pull through all 3 loops on hook this is also called decrease single_crochet i would love to see pictures of your finished projects use #landryslouchhat on instagram if you are a ravelry user consider making an official ravelry project thank you so much for using my pattern twisted arrow d e s i g n s facebook @twistedarrowcaligraphy | instagram twistedarrowdesigns email twistedarrowdesigns@gmail com | ravelry twisted arrow designs | etsy twistedarrowcrochet this pattern is a work of love and labor please do not copy the pattern to share it or claim it as your own please be kind and link to my instagram or ravelry store if posting online ©2018 twisted arrow designs �4
